ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia heard the suggestion it wasn t bad under normal circumstances (Or in a DragonballZ cartoon) but these weren t normal circumstances. they only had a few

Phobia heard the suggestion it wasn't bad under normal circumstances 
(Or in a DragonballZ cartoon) but these weren't normal circumstances. 
they only had a few days to perfect a plan before the Maximals 
launched thier assault on the Iron Fist, he only had a couple of days 
to coordinate something that would perfect the two attacks. 

No matter what he'd come out on top, The Iron Fist would be either 
destroyed or controlled by someone he controlled. If the Maximals 
came out victorious he'd be an honored hero for having supplied the 
information. Or the Maximals would cease to function and nobody would 
be the wiser to the treasonous acts performed. If KitKat failed and 
her team was deleated he'd just claim to be following her orders.

The only losing scenario would be if the Iron Fist destroyed the 
planet like he believed it would.

(Which reminds me Has Hysteria been all cooped up in the CF's engine 
room void of contact all this time?)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "I say we take them to the roughest land, we can find. Make them 
rough
> it out there, and spar, almost 24/7."
